original_text: Much time had been lost, and sailing had already become dangerous because by now it was after the Day of Atonement. So Paul warned them,
korean_text: 여러 날이 걸려 금식하는 절기가 이미 지났으므로 항해하기가 위태한지라 바울이 그들을 권하여

sentences.original_text: and sailing had already become dangerous
because by now it was after the Day of Atonement
